website_summaries.verdict: Transforms from a paddle boat into a floating sun lounger for two.
pros: Adjustable seating for up to three adults and two kids
Pedal positions for one, two, or three people
Seats fully recline to create an on-the-water sun lounger for two
Built-in cooler or storage area with beverage holders
Rugged UV-stabilized Fortiflex High Density Polyethylene deck and hull

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you check shipping
customer_reviews.text: Received the item off the back of a small truck. No packaging material at all. Just a ripped up piece of clear light plastic. Item was scratched and dirty. Looked like it was used. There was a large hole in the side from a forklift fork. Not good for a boat. I was amazed they actually tried to deliver it in that condition.
customer_reviews.author: David M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love our new boat. We go out on our little lake and enjoy nature!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: been having fun futsing around our little lake
customer_reviews.text: been having fun futsing around our little lake. Very easy to get on and off our dock with drinks in hand :)!
customer_reviews.author: Warren

customer_reviews.title: Sun Dolphin Sun Slider Paddle Boat
customer_reviews.text: The paddle boat is great! It peddles easily with one person and the backrest is adjustable to make reaching the peddles better even for someone short like me! Great summer fun for the kids too!
customer_reviews.author: Rene T. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Nifty little vessel
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little boat. Took guests and their kids around our pond and they had a blast. Super stable platform, lightweight...If you have a pond, this is a no brainer. Great for fishing too.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T.

customer_reviews.title: Nice solid boat at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice solid boat at a good price. We probably use ours 5-10 hours a season -- so this was a good fit.
customer_reviews.author: Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Great boat pedals well nice set up with canopy
customer_reviews.text: Great boat pedals well nice set up with canopy. The only problem was with delivery. Told when we called to confirm delivery that the truck did not do dirt roads. Smaller trucks should be available.
customer_reviews.author: David H. Smith

customer_reviews.title: light and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying this craft. Built well, light and easy to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Alain Lapierre

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for my grandchildren!
customer_reviews.text: The best gift I ever purchased for my grandchildren! They love it. Their house backs up to a lake. Great fun!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy T

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This boat was better than expected. Built very durable and a great price. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Ross

customer_reviews.title: So cool.
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. So fun, so cool for our new vacation home on the creek. The only issue, I'm not sure if the weight limit is 500 or 800. I have to differing weight limits. Needless to say we are going with the lesser of the 2 which is the one on the maximum weight plate on the boat.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Wu

customer_reviews.title: We love our new boat
customer_reviews.text: We love our new boat. It is very fun! The only thing is the back seats are a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: great boat
customer_reviews.text: We looked at lots of paddle boats, this is far & away the best one we found.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: NO THANKS!~
customer_reviews.text: This boat does not float. It's probably due to the large hole in it. Sort of defeats the purpose of a boat.
customer_reviews.author: Jay in seattle

customer_reviews.title: Recieved wrong product
customer_reviews.text: Received wrong product, ordered the Sun Dolphin 5 and received the Sun Dolphin 3.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Amy Lu

product_meta.title: Sun Dolphin Sun Slider Adjustable 5 Seat Pedal Boat
product_meta.description:
The Sun Dolphin Sun Slider Adjustable 5-Seat Pedal Boat comfortably seats 3 in the front and 2 in the back with the adjustable seats set in the forward position. Built-in coolers allow you bring along your favorite beverage or act as storage areas to hold extra gear. The boat is constructed with a rugged, uv-stabilized fortiflex polyethylene deck and hull, an aluminum tiller steering system and a tough paddle wheel..


***Important information when placing your order***


Please verify address and telephone# are accurate. The carriers will contact the phone number on the order to set up a delivery appointment. If this information is inaccurate, there is a possibility that your order will be delayed or cancelled with a possible fee incurred at the sellers discretion.



AMAZON.COM
Cruise around the lake in comfort and style with the Sun Slider adjustable five-person pedal boat. The Sun Slider, which seats three people in the front and two in the back, easily accommodates both families and groups of friends as they make the most of a sunny day. Plus, the high-back supports are removable, so two passengers can lounge in chaise-like comfort. The Sun Slider's construction, meanwhile, is tough and long lasting, with a rugged, UV-stabilized Fortiflex polyethylene deck and hull, an aluminum tiller steering system, and a super-tough paddle wheel. Best of all, the boat easily books across the water thanks to the three-position pedal cranks, which allow for one-, two, or three-person operation. Just settle in, place a beverage in the recessed drink holders, and start pedaling. The boat even includes built-in coolers for pop, water, and other cool beverages (the coolers can also function as storage areas). 

 Other details include a built-in motor mount; a protective vinyl rub rail; maintenance-free, oil-impregnated bronze bushings with rubber seals; a mooring cleat; and light-colored decks for maximum comfort on hot days. 

 Specifications:

 * Capacity: 825 pounds 
 * Length: 93 inches 
 * Width: 65 inches 
 * Height: 24.5 inches 
 * Weight: 110 pounds 
 * Deck: Pewter 
 * Hull: Blue/teal 



FROM THE MANUFACTURER
The Sun Slider is our most versatile and full featured pedal boat model. The high seat backs adjust to maximize pedaling comfort for both kids and adults. They also convert to a reclining position to create an on-the-water sun lounge for two.

See more
feature_bullets: Adjustable seating for 3 adults and 2 kids to maximize pedaling comfort
Seats fully recline to create an on the water sun lounge for two
Built-in cooler or storage area with beverage holders to make your ride a smooth and peaceful one
Rugged UV-stabilized Fortiflex High Density Polyethylene deck and hull
Pedal positions for 1, 2 or 3 people; Maintenance free bronze bushings for longer life
***IMPORTANT – phone number is needed to schedule a delivery appointment***
